title: Taking offers on T206 two name cards...
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Taking offers on T206 two name cards...
posts.post_content:
It might be time to break up my mini-hoard of these.  All are SGC graded.  I don't have strict prices in mind, but NOT looking for trades unless you have the Rossman-Thomas card :rolleyes:

Chase-Zimmermann : SGC 30
Graham-Clark : SGC 50
[S]Lennox-Clancy : SGC 40[/S] - SOLD
[S]Bradley-Bender : SGC 30[/S] - SOLD

[IMG]http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us192852.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://sgccardregistry.com/cards/us212413.jpg[/IMG]

Hi Erick,
     Would you take $30 for the SGC 30 Zimmermann?
Merrill

[quote name="Merrillstoys" post=1043842]Hi Erick,
     Would you take $30 for the SGC 30 Zimmermann?
Merrill[/QUOTE]

Ummmm.... no.

Erick, I have these all SGC 40's available for trade, if you need any of them
let me know I would be interested in one or two of the two names.

Thanks 
Patrick

Burch batting PD 150/25
Ames hands above head Polar bear
Flick PD 150/25
Huggins hands at mouth PD 350/25
Pelty Horizontal PD 150/25

Sorry... My post was originally missing the word 'not' regarding looking for trades.  At this point, I do not want to trade; only interested in selling (or keeping).

Eric,
     I really thought that two names were worth less.:o:o:o
I knew I had one in my collection.  Would this card be two names?

[quote name="Merrillstoys" post=1043893]Eric,
     I really thought that two names were worth less.:o:o:o
I knew I had one in my collection.  Would this card be two names?[/QUOTE]

that's a double name (the same name twice); a two name is one with two different names.

[quote name="t206hound" post=1043896]that's a double name (the same name twice); a two name is one with two different names.[/QUOTE]

Lol when did double names get so complicated?:D
I did sell one a month or so ago... wouldn't mind moving another...
